lead_paragraph: Russia’s cheapest thrill disappeared at dawn on Friday, when the minimum price for a half-liter of vodka nearly doubled as part of an anti-alcoholism campaign.
snippet: Russia’s cheapest thrill disappeared at dawn on Friday, when the minimum price for a half-liter of vodka nearly doubled as part of an anti-alcoholism campaign.

headline.main: In Russia, a New Year and a New Price for Vodka
headline.print_headline: In Russia, a New Year and a New Price for Vodka
